name: Doodle God, Doodle Devil & Doodle Kingdom
name_original: Doodle God, Doodle Devil & Doodle Kingdom
description:
Doodle God
Mix different elements to create your own universe in Doodle God! Starting from a single microorganism, create animals, tools, and even armies! Unleash your inner god with Doodle God™!
Doodle Devil
Embrace your dark side! While Doodle God was creating the universe, Doodle Devil was also having some fun. The same addictive, puzzle game play that made Doodle God a hit is back but with an evil twist.
Doodle Kingdom
It’s time to get MEDIEVAL! From the creators of the award winning puzzle games Doodle God & Doodle Devil, comes a fantasy brain-teaser where you can quest as a Dragon Breeder, Warlock and Knight!

Doodle God, Doodle Devil & Doodle Kingdom

Compatible with PlayStation®Vita only.
Gameplay requires PlayStation®Vita memory card (sold separately).
10500KB minimum space required
1 Player
Touchscreen

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service). One time license fee entitles play on up to 3 PlayStation® Vita systems activated by this account.
